blogPost.excerpt: On-demand experts to help you build a better website. Whatever your goals—improving signups, sales, or UX—there’s a genie who can help. Just choose a genie, pay their one time fee, and Jam with them. It’s 1-1 help from experts tackling your exact problem.
blogPost.body: On-demand experts to help you build a better website. Whatever your goals—improving signups, sales, or UX—there’s a genie who can help. Just choose a genie, pay their one time fee, and Jam with them. It’s 1-1 help from experts tackling your exact problem.
blogPost.title: Jam Genies - On-demand expert feedback to help you build a better website
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 按需专家帮助您建立一个更好的网站。无论您的目标是什么--改善注册、销售或用户体验--都有精灵可以帮助您。只需选择一个精灵，支付他们的一次性费用，然后与他们一起Jam。这是1-1的帮助，由专家解决您的具体问题。
localize.tagline: 按需的专家反馈，帮助你建立一个更好的网站。

localize.description: 按需專家幫助您建立一個更好的網站。無論您的目標是什麼--改善註冊、銷售或用戶體驗--都有精靈可以幫助您。只需選擇一個精靈，支付他們的一次性費用，然後與他們一起Jam。這是1-1的幫助，由專家解決您的具體問題。
localize.tagline: 按需的專家反饋，幫助你建立一個更好的網站。

previous.excerpt: Run your entire company in one single place — manage projects and tasks, track revenue and expenses, invoice your customers, capture leads and communicate with clients, share knowledge and effectively collaborate with your team.
previous.title: Flowlu - All-in-one productivity tool for effective work management

localize.description: 在一个地方管理您的整个公司 - 管理项目和任务，跟踪收入和支出，为您的客户开具发票，捕捉潜在客户并与客户沟通，分享知识并与您的团队有效协作。
localize.tagline: 一体化生产力工具，有效管理工作

localize.description: 在一個地方管理您的整個公司 - 管理項目和任務，跟蹤收入和支出，爲您的客戶開具發票，捕捉潛在客戶並與客戶溝通，分享知識並與您的團隊有效協作。
localize.tagline: 一體化生產力工具，有效管理工作

next.excerpt: Abacum is a financial planning tool for mid-sized companies. Save time by integrating data sources and automating manual processes. Generate better insights with analytical tools built for finance-users. Collaborate easily across teams and locations.
next.title: Abacum - Helping finance teams deliver business insights 10x faster

localize.description: Abacum是一款针对中型企业的财务规划工具。通过整合数据源和自动化手动流程来节省时间。通过为财务用户设计的分析工具产生更好的洞察力。跨团队和地点轻松协作。
localize.tagline: 帮助财务团队以10倍的速度提供业务洞察力。

localize.description: Abacum是一款針對中型企業的財務規劃工具。通過整合數據源和自動化手動流程來節省時間。通過爲財務用戶設計的分析工具產生更好的洞察力。跨團隊和地點輕鬆協作。
localize.tagline: 幫助財務團隊以10倍的速度提供業務洞察力。
